abstract: Andrew Berman, retired Chicago judge, releases dashboard camera video showing police officer Marco Proano shooting into car full of black teenagers who posed no apparent threat; video had been barred from public release in civil case against police department, but Berman was allowed to release it because video had been introduced in criminal trial of one of the teenagers.
lead_paragraph: A retired judge has released a 2013 dashboard camera video from a Chicago police car that shows a white officer repeatedly firing his handgun into a car full of black youths who had been pulled over for speeding.
snippet: A retired judge has released a 2013 dashboard camera video from a Chicago police car that shows a white officer repeatedly firing his handgun into a car full of black youths who had been pulled over for speeding.
